venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest, East Entrance Parking Area

item.description:
Join the DCR Park Interpreter on a hike through Myles Standish State Forest.  This hike travels along different trails each week and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  We’ll meet at the East Entrance Parking Lot #4.

Rain cancels  If in doubt, call Park Phone Number: 508-866-2526 All programs are free and open to the public unless otherwise noted. All children must be accompanied by an adult. Reasonable accommodations are available upon request.

Join us at Metro's Cafe on 3A in Manomet for breakfast at 7:30 if you are interested. Their $2.95 Early Bird special is a deal.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off The Beaten Path Hike: East Entrance
